category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_user_staging_unix_location
preference.preference_description: Defines the user staging location to be used by simulation process management on Unix platform. Note: In Active Workspace client, the User Staging Location is visible only for the "Local" launch. For "Server" launch, the User Staging Location is hidden and the system TEMP directory is used as the user staging location.
